title: Page 14
content:
The leading taxi did turn in through the big iron gates.

 Bond smiled with grim satisfaction. He leaned forward. "Thanks, driver. Headquarters please."

 The End

book.title: Octopussy & the Living Daylights (James Bond #14)
book.description: Storyline: Octopussy & the Living Daylights (James Bond (Original Series) #14) \n Whether it is tracking down a wayward major who has taken a deadly secret with him to the Caribbean or identifying a top Russian agent secretly bidding for a Fabergé egg in a Sotheby’s auction room, Bond always closes the case—with extreme prejudice.\n
book.author: Ian Fleming
